remarks: De Morgan-like law for subspace orthocomplement.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-2014.)
statement:
dochdmj1.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dochdmj1.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochdmj1.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dochdmj1.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dochdmj1 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ X C_ V /\ Y C_ V ) -> ( ._|_ ` ( X u. Y ) ) = ( ( ._|_ ` X ) i^i ( ._|_ ` Y ) ) ) $.
